item.description: Crypto giant Animoca Brands, now valued at $6 billion, is preparing for a new $100 million funding. The round will be led by Temasek, a Singapore’s state investment fund with net portfolio value of hundreds of billions of dollars.
item.content:encoded:
Crypto giant Animoca Brands, now valued at $6 billion, is preparing for a new $100 million funding. The round will be led by Temasek, a Singapore’s state investment fund with net portfolio value of hundreds of billions of dollars.

More details: https://wngamefi.com/2022/08/30/temasek-animoca-brands-100-million-funding-round

item.title: Polygon founder launches $50 million crypto fund to accelerate mass adoption of Web3
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: Sandeep Nailwal, co-founder of Polygon, has started a new venture capital fund titled Symbolic Capital. The company will focus on startups from emerging markets and help bolster the mass adoption of Web3 globally.
item.content:encoded:
Sandeep Nailwal, co-founder of Polygon, has started a new venture capital fund titled Symbolic Capital. The company will focus on startups from emerging markets and help bolster the mass adoption of Web3 globally.

More details: https://wngamefi.com/2022/08/29/symbolic-capital-50-million-web3-fund-from-polygon-founder

item.title: Phil Spencer explains his cautiousness about P2E games: “It creates a worker force out of players”
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: Xbox head Phil Spencer has shared his thoughts on the latest trends in GameFi. He expressed his concerns about the play-to-earn model and explained why a lot of gamers now don’t like the concept of the metaverse.
item.content:encoded:
Xbox head Phil Spencer has shared his thoughts on the latest trends in GameFi. He expressed his concerns about the play-to-earn model and explained why a lot of gamers now don’t like the concept of the metaverse.

More details: https://wngamefi.com/2022/08/29/phil-spencer-metaverse-play-to-earn-interview

item.title: Crypto gaming DAO Matchbox raises $7.5 million to become ‘on-chain version of Unreal Engine’
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: MatchboxDAO, a community of on-chain game developers, has raised $7.5 million at a $50 million valuation. The team will promote development on Ethereum scaling platform StarkNet and build infrastructure for on-chain titles.
item.content:encoded:
MatchboxDAO, a community of on-chain game developers, has raised $7.5 million at a $50 million valuation. The team will promote development on Ethereum scaling platform StarkNet and build infrastructure for on-chain titles.

item.title: PlayNFT launches platform allowing streamers to create NFTs with in-game utility
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: PlayNFT has raised over $300k for its new cross-chain platform. It will let Twitch and YouTube streamers create their own NFTs that can be used in blockchain games. However, the project leaves more questions than answers about the way it works and titles it supports.
item.content:encoded:
PlayNFT has raised over $300k for its new cross-chain platform. It will let Twitch and YouTube streamers create their own NFTs that can be used in blockchain games. However, the project leaves more questions than answers about the way it works and titles it supports.

More details: https://wngamefi.com/2022/08/18/playnft-launches-platform-twich-youtube-streamers-mint-nft-in-game-utility

item.title: Animoca Brands and its subsidiary Lympo bring chess to blockchain in new Web3 game Anichess
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: Animoca Brands and its subsidiary Lympo have announced a partnership with chess digital services provider Play Magnus Group. Together, the three companies are working on Anichess, a play-and-earn game that is said to “merge the worlds of chess and GameFi.”
item.content:encoded:
Animoca Brands and its subsidiary Lympo have announced a partnership with chess digital services provider Play Magnus Group. Together, the three companies are working on Anichess, a play-and-earn game that is said to “merge the worlds of chess and GameFi.”

item.title: Ultima creator Richard Garriot unveils Web3 MMO Iron & Magic, urges players to buy NFT land
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: Richard Garriot’s new NFT MMO game, announced a few months ago, now has a name and an official website. The upcoming project involving the Ultima creator encourages future players to buy digital land pots “in the realm of Lord British.”

item.title: Lysto raises $12 million to standardize gamer reputation through on-chain credentials
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: India-based Web3 startup Lysto has raised $12 million to improve its protocol for on-chain credentials. The company’s main goal is to standardize the reputation of users playing different blockchain games and participating in online tournaments.

item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: South Korean developer and publisher Neowiz Corporation has announced its decision to step into the blockchain field. As part of this strategy, the company teamed up with Polygon to launch gaming platform Intella X and bring some of its IPs to Web3.

item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov

item.title: Gunzilla Games raises $46 million to integrate NFT marketplace into its cyberpunk battle royale Off the Grid
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: Gunzilla Games has closed a $46 million round for its GunZ, a blockchain-based marketplace supporting NFTs. It will be the foundation of the company’s Neill Blomkamp-directed battle royale Off the Grid, allowing players to purchase in-game assets and take them out of the game.
item.content:encoded:
Gunzilla Games has closed a $46 million round for its GunZ, a blockchain-based marketplace supporting NFTs. It will be the foundation of the company’s Neill Blomkamp-directed battle royale Off the Grid, allowing players to purchase in-game assets and take them out of the game.

More details: https://wngamefi.com/2022/08/09/gunzilla-games-raises-46-million-gunz-nft-marketplace-off-the-grid

item.title: ZED RUN to allow virtual horses lending as first instance of utility for its ZED token
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: Blockchain horse racing game ZED RUN has announced that its new lending system is on the way. Players will be able to lend and borrow virtual mounts to participate in events and get access to special rewards. This feature should offer the first instance of utility for the game’s new ZED Token.
item.content:encoded:
Blockchain horse racing game ZED RUN has announced that its new lending system is on the way. Players will be able to lend and borrow virtual mounts to participate in events and get access to special rewards. This feature should offer the first instance of utility for the game’s new ZED Token.

More details: https://wngamefi.com/2022/08/08/zed-run-horse-lending-zed-token-utility

item.title: Halliday raises $6 million to integrate ‘buy now, pay later’ NFTs into blockchain games
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: Halliday wants to lower the entry barrier to blockchain gaming. The startup has raised $6 million to offer players “buy now, pay later” NFTs, so they could claim ownership of in-game assets and pay for them over time.

item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov

item.title: Hackers drain up to $8 million from Solana wallets in latest crypto attack
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: Solana is the latest victim of a crypto hack. An unknown attacker has drained thousands of internet-connected wallets, stealing millions in tokens. The hack is now being blamed on a supply chain attack on iOS and Android.

Solana is the latest victim of a crypto hack. An unknown attacker has drained thousands of internet-connected wallets, stealing millions in tokens. The hack is now being blamed on a supply chain attack on iOS and Android.

The ultimate goal is to help developers build real economies in video games and let players earn Bitcoin while playing.

item.title: US senator calls on SEC to ‘crack down’ on crypto platforms that scam customers

item.description: Us Democratic Senator Elizabeth Warren has called on Congress and the Securities & Exchange Commission (SEC) to tighten regulations on the crypto industry and protect customers from scams. item.title: Metaverse platform Mona raises $14.6 million to let creators build and sell virtual worlds as NFTs
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: Mona has raised $14.6 million for its metaverse platform for digital creators. It is designed to help people build virtual worlds and sell them as NFTs, while also offering its own infrastructure and editor.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Report: NFT market “has fallen off the cliff” in June, with sales dropping below $1 billion mark
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: The NFT market has continued its downfall this month, with sales dropping to the lowest levels in the last 12 months. Experts think that investors are now looking for safer places following the latest Terra collapse and other warning signs.

item.title: Project Twelve raises $8 million to build its Web3 gaming ecosystem and make game economy sustainable
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: Project Twelve (P12), which operates its own metaverse editor, has closed a new $8 million funding round. The company will allocate the money to develop its own Web3 gaming ecosystem and make the game economy sustainable. One of the goals is to remove the widespread for-profit model.
item.content:encoded:
Project Twelve (P12), which operates its own metaverse editor, has closed a new $8 million funding round. The company will allocate the money to develop its own Web3 gaming ecosystem and make the game economy sustainable. One of the goals is to remove the widespread for-profit model.

item.title: STEPN’s reward token plunges 98% in two months while its move-to-earn rivals on rise
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: STEPN, the most famous move-to-earn app globally, has seen its reward token drop almost 100% in the last two months. This might be due to the unsustainability of the product’s tokenomics. However, its rivals in the category have been on the rise for a while.

item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: Harmony, a blockchain protocol for Web3 apps and games like DeFi Kingdoms, has offered a $1 million bounty for the return of $100 million stolen during the latest bridge attack. However, some people think the reward is too low for hackers to consider taking it.

item.title: Meta, Microsoft, Epic Games, and 33 other tech giants form metaverse standards body
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: 36 tech giants, including Epic Games, Microsoft, and Meta, have formed a special group for the open metaverse. They will cooperate to accelerate the development of standards needed to build and deploy digital worlds compatible with each other.

item.title: Create-to-earn economy explained: what to know about Bisonic’s Web3 MMORPG Forgotten Runiverse
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: Bisonic has launched the first playable demo of its upcoming Web3 MMORPG based on the Forgotten Runes Wizard’s Cult NFT collection. Titled Forgotten Runiverse, the game utilizes the so-called “create-to-earn” model, tokenizing every digital item and providing players with more UGC opportunities.
item.content:encoded:
Bisonic has launched the first playable demo of its upcoming Web3 MMORPG based on the Forgotten Runes Wizard’s Cult NFT collection. Titled Forgotten Runiverse, the game utilizes the so-called “create-to-earn” model, tokenizing every digital item and providing players with more UGC opportunities.

More details: https://wngamefi.com/2022/06/21/create-to-earn-economy-explained-forgotten-runiverse-web3-game-bisonic

item.title: Animoca Brands snaps up TinyTap for $38 million to mix blockchain with educational UGC
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: Animoca Brands has acquired a majority stake in TinyTap, a platform that allows users to create educational games. The $38.8 million deal should help the Hong Kong-based company gain its foothold in the area of blockchain-based educational UGC.

item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: VC firm True Global Ventures (TGV), which has already backed blockchain companies like The Sandbox and Animoca Brands, has announced the first closure of its $146 million follow-on fund. It will support late-stage Web3 startups, including gaming ones.

VC firm True Global Ventures (TGV), which has already backed blockchain companies like The Sandbox and Animoca Brands, has announced the first closure of its $146 million follow-on fund. It will support late-stage Web3 startups, including gaming ones.

item.title: Uncorrelated demand, time-limited events, and other things blockchain games can learn from Genshin Impact
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: Blockchain games have been attracting investors’ attention for a while now, but they usually struggle to retain players and keep the engagement level high. So here are 5 things that crypto developers can learn from free-to-play hits like Genshin Impact to improve their projects.

item.title: ‘Snow Crash’ author Neal Stephenson steps into Web3 by announcing ‘truly open metaverse’ LAMINA1
item.dc:creator: Evgeny Obedkov
item.description: Neal Stephenson is known for defining the term “Metaverse” in his cyberpunk novel “Snow Crash” back in the early 90s. The writer has now decided to bring his own vision of this concept to life by announcing a new project titled LAMINA1 aimed at helping creators realize their ideas.

Neal Stephenson is known for defining the term “Metaverse” in his cyberpunk novel “Snow Crash” back in the early 90s. The writer has now decided to bring his own vision of this concept to life by announcing a new project titled LAMINA1 aimed at helping creators realize their ideas.

item.title: Citigroup expects metaverse industry to reach up to $13 trillion by 2030 despite skepticism

item.description: Metaverse has become the buzzword for tech companies and startups across the globe over the last year. Despite the skepticism around this sector remaining high, some analysts think that it might turn into a $13 trillion industry by the end of this decade.
